title: Tuclikk
author: Tuclikk
content: Bitcoin has a maximum potential in the digital currency world, yet it can also be of the overall leading coin in the crypto world who's ranking can never be equivalent to others. Bitcoin can be of a use not just now but also in the future that is why it has a five star ranking in the crypto world.The way things are moving around the nation, which has not yet had an impact on cryptocurrencies, will soon do so in light of the promising future that lies ahead.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 06, 2023, 11:43:03 PMThe way things are moving around the nation, which has not yet had an impact on cryptocurrencies, will soon do so in light of the promising future that lies ahead.i’m not exactly sure what you’re pertaining to when you say things that are happening around us but i think the recent events of the world has had an impact on cryptocurrencies the development of technology is one of the firsts events in the world that had an impact on crypto and now as technology continues to grow further, we are seeing more and more developments in the crypto worldinflation is rising in a lot of nations and so more and more people are starting to invest their money in  crypto instead of storing them into banks

comments.author: MarjorieZimmermanGinger
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 06, 2023, 11:43:03 PMBitcoin has a maximum potential in the digital currency world, yet it can also be of the overall leading coin in the crypto world who's ranking can never be equivalent to others. Bitcoin can be of a use not just now but also in the future that is why it has a five star ranking in the crypto world.Do you know that makes Bitcoin one of the best so that it can place itself as one of the most valuable. Bitcoin does not follow steps like other coins and that's why Bitcoin is considered quite fundamental and Bitcoin has strength when inflation involves maintaining value against the Fiat currency that is always devastated. You can prove it when Covid-19 occurs and also today you can see how Bitcoin is in the same condition.Technology has a role for the growth of crypto in general and bitcoin specifically because the presence of both can be useful to foster people's interest. And vice versa with Fiat who loses value so that people look for a new system that can guarantee the value of money being placed and thus the solution is in Bitcoin as we have seen today.Quote from: Tuclikk on December 06, 2023, 11:43:03 PMThe way things are moving around the nation, which has not yet had an impact on cryptocurrencies, will soon do so in light of the promising future that lies ahead.The whole world has a positive impact on the presence of Bitcoin even if the country has fully prohibited the use of Bitcoin. Why I say like that because the growth of bitcoin can run quite well when there is a process of selling and buying and if referring to economic law, the level of growth of bitcoin has been running quite rapidly at this time.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 06, 2023, 11:43:03 PMBitcoin has a maximum potential in the digital currency world, yet it can also be of the overall leading coin in the crypto world who's ranking can never be equivalent to others. Bitcoin can be of a use not just now but also in the future that is why it has a five star ranking in the crypto world.The way things are moving around the nation, which has not yet had an impact on cryptocurrencies, will soon do so in light of the promising future that lies ahead.Not really sure what you meant here, but since Bitcoin started the whole crypto currency movement, yeah is the leading and the prime mover. However, you have to think that not every nation in the world is pro-bitcoin, there could still be some of them who see the negative, hence they totally ban it.But for us who have been a crypto enthusiast, it's a game changer, other become crypto millionaire specially those early adopters.And then there's the financial freedom that we are enjoying right because of how some of us become financially knowledgeable and we have our bitcoin investment and make money specially in the next bull run.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 06, 2023, 11:43:03 PMBitcoin has a maximum potential in the digital currency world, yet it can also be of the overall leading coin in the crypto world who's ranking can never be equivalent to others. Bitcoin can be of a use not just now but also in the future that is why it has a five star ranking in the crypto world.The way things are moving around the nation, which has not yet had an impact on cryptocurrencies, will soon do so in light of the promising future that lies ahead.Well, its top ranking isn't just on the crypto market for being 5 star or top one. But look at this statistics made by this website for having the most market capitalization in the world. Bitcoin sits currently on #9 and IIRC, it was more than 10 a few months ago and look how quick it is moving and expect that it'll move faster during this bull run.--> https://companiesmarketcap.com/assets-by-market-cap/

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 06, 2023, 11:43:03 PMThe way things are moving around the nation, which has not yet had an impact on cryptocurrencies, will soon do so in light of the promising future that lies ahead. technology has gradually taken a serious hold on the world and nations that where not technologically inclined are gradually shifting her attention to investing and accepting the positive change that technology brings. And this obviously has played a great part in making several countries to tilt towards accepting bitcoin in there country. The awareness is rampant and within some few years to come, the knowledge of bitcoin and other cryptocurrency will be as common as an average person knowing what Facebook, twitter and other social media platforms are used for.

comments.author: Tuclikk
comments.created_time: December 07, 2023, 09:39:49 AMLast edit: December 11, 2023, 09:05:16 PM by Mr. Big

And this obviously has played a great part in making several countries to tilt towards accepting bitcoin in there country. The awareness is rampant and within some few years to come, the knowledge of bitcoin and other cryptocurrency will be as common as an average person knowing what Facebook, twitter and other social media platforms are used for.Crypto currency has been on the Top one list in each and every country just because of it future, it makes buying and selling easy and more faster.
